name: Quest room: Hanon
description: After 20 years in search of the mysterious Egyptian artifact of Hanon, you managed to find the entrance, but to get inside you need to solve more than one puzzle. You do not have much time, you are locked in 4 walls and oxygen is running out.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1 & 10 Processor: 2.2GHz Dual Core Memory: 2Gb VRAM MB RAM Graphics: Video card with 512MB of VRAM
